alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 5:06AM EDT until May 09 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning and rise to a crest of around 24.8 feet near 1 AM EDT on Sunday. The river will then begin to recede and should fall below flood stage on Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.9 feet on 01/26/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 2 PM this afternoon.
